item.title: {UPDATED} Help me add shops

item.description:
@DePredaTe wrote:

{EDIT}

Alright, for some reason i can’t add the shops. i have everything right, but i still get d/ced when i try to open the shop.

here’s the code:

		}else if (NPCID == 519) {
					PutNPCCoords = true;
					WanneShop = 23; // Bobs Axe Store

it just, d/cs me. thats it. no errors while compiling, nothing.
